string-array.name: comps
string-array.item: You smell nice today
You look lovely
Your smile shines like the light of a thousand suns
That hairstyle really suits you well
You look beautiful tonight
Nice shoes!
Your smile is contagious
You have gorgeous eyes
I love you more than I love puppies
Your nose is cute, it is the cutest nose I\'ve ever seen
You\'re a beautiful person
You should be proud of yourself
You have a great sense of humor
You\'re a strong person
You\'re like sunshine a rainy day
You\'re a great listener
Being around you makes everything better
Colors seem brighter while you\'re around
You\'re one of a kind
You\'re an inspiration
Being around you is like being on a little vacation
You\'re more fun than dogs and bubble wrap
You\'re like a breath of fresh air
You\'re someone\'s reason to smile
You\'re a gift to those around you
You are smarter than you think
You are an outstanding human being

string-array.item: somethinf
